tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE QualityControlMeasuresInNanotechManufacturing (
  ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  SampleID INT NOT NULL,
  InspectorName VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  MeasurementValue DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  MeasurementUnit VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  MeasurementDate DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE quality_control (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    manufacturing_date DATE,
    quality_standard VARCHAR(100),
    inspector_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE measurement_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    measurement_date DATE,
    measurement_value FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES quality_control(id)
);

CREATE TABLE manufacturing_processes (
    process_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    process_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  qc_id INT,
  standard_id INT,
  manufacturer_id INT,
  record_date TIMESTAMP,
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
);
